thread.title: Dilip Vengsarkar cricket academy trials
thread.title_full: Dilip Vengsarkar cricket academy trials - Sports

author: A Correspondent
title: Dilip Vengsarkar cricket academy trials
text:
The Dilip Vengsarkar Foundation would be conducting selection trials at its academy's ground at Mahul (Chembur) for the boys between 12 to 18 on October 6 and 7 from 7 to 9am and 4 to 6pm. Those born after 1-9-1997 and before 1-9-2003 are eligible for the trials.
The boys are requested to attend the selection trials in cricketing whites, cricket shoes and kit. They are required to carry their birth certificate. For details contact Amit Jadhav 9892600155.
